===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|anatomy}} [[head]]
#: {{zh-x|我 頭 不再 痛 了。|My head doesn't hurt any more.}}
#* {{zh-x|我 又 要 叫 你 和 女人 彼此 為{wéi} 仇；你 的 後裔 和 女人 的 後裔 也 彼此 為{wéi} 仇。女人 的 後裔 要 傷 你 的 頭；你 要 傷 他 的 腳跟。|And I will put enmity between thee and the woman, and between thy seed and her seed; it shall bruise thy '''head''', and thou shalt bruise his heel.|ref={{w2|zh|新標點和合本}} ([[w:Chinese Union Version|Chinese Union Version with New Punctuation]]), {{lang|zh|創世記}} (Genesis) 3:15}}
# [[hair]]
# [[top]]; [[tip]]; [[end]]
# [[chief]]; [[boss]]
# [[remnant]]; [[end]]
# {{zh-classifier|[[livestock]]|cat=y}}
#: {{zh-x|我 有 兩 頭 豬。|I have two pigs.}}
# [[first]]; [[leading]]
# {{n-g|Diminutive suffix.}}

{{ja-kanjitab|かぶ|yomi=irr}}

{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|かぶ}}

===Etymology 5===
{{ja-kanjitab|つぶり|yomi=irr}}
Probably a compound of {{m|ja|粒|tr=tsubu||round thing, such as a grain}} + {{m|ja|ろ|tr=ro||pos=suffix indicating a state or condition}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|つぶり}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|つぶり}}

# [[head]]

===Etymology 6===
{{ja-kanjitab|つむり|yomi=irr}}
From ''tsuburi'' above. Bilabial plosive {{IPAchar|/b/}} becomes bilabial nasal {{IPAchar|/m/}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|つむり|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|つむり}}

# [[head]]
# [[hair]] of [[head]]

===Etymology 7===
{{ja-kanjitab|つむ|yomi=irr}}
Shortened from ''tsumuri'': see above.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|つむ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|つむ}}

# [[head]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|御頭|おつむ}}: [[head]] (mainly used of an infant)
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 8===
{{ja-kanjitab|こうべ|yomi=k}}
{{IPAchar|/kamipe/}} → {{IPAchar|/kampe/}} → {{IPAchar|/kaube/}} → {{IPAchar|/koːbe/}}

Compound of either {{m|ja|上|tr=kami||upper}} or {{m|ja|髪|tr=kami||hair}} (likely {{l|en|cognate}}s) with the suffix {{m|ja|方|tr=pe||location, direction}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

Alternatively, may be an alteration from {{lang|ja|頭}} (''kabu'', “head”, see above) + {{m|ja|上|tr=ue||up}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|こうべ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=3|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK|acc3=1|acc3_ref=NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|首}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こうべ|hhira=かうべ}}

# {{l|en|head}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|髑髏|されこうべ}}
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 9===
{{ja-kanjitab|どたま|yomi=irr}}
Contraction of {{prefix|lang=ja|sort=とたま'|ど|tr1=do|t1=super-|pos1=often used ironically as a derogatory prefix|頭|tr2=atama|t2=head}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|どたま|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|どたま}}

# {{lb|ja|derogatory|sort=とたま'}} [[head]]

=====Usage notes=====
Often spelled in hiragana, as {{m|ja|どたま}}.

{{ja-kanjitab|ず|yomi=o}}
{{IPAchar|/du/}} → {{IPAchar|/d͡zu/}} → {{IPAchar|/zu/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=す'}} {{m|zh|頭|tr=duw||head}}.
